text: Daniel Van Buyten (;In isolation, van is pronounced . born 7 February 1978) is a Belgian former footballer who played as a centre back. ==Career statistics== ===Club=== Appearances and goals by club, season and competition Club Season League National Cup League Cup Europe Other Total Division Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goals Charleroi 1998–99 First Division 19 1 — — 19 1 Standard Liège 1999–2000 First Division 28 3 — — 28 3 2000–01 29 4 2 1 — 31 5 Total 57 7 2 1 0 0 59 8 — Marseille 2001–02 Division 1 23 2 3 1 2 0 — — 28 4 2002–03 Ligue 1 35 8 2 1 4 0 — — 41 9 2003–04 18 2 2 0 1 0 8 1 — 29 3 Total 76 6 7 2 7 0 8 1 0 0 98 10 — Manchester City 2003–04 Premier League 5 0 1 0 0 0 0 0 — 6 0 Hamburger SV 2004–05 Bundesliga 34 5 1 0 — 4 0 — 39 5 2005–06 27 2 3 1 — 15 2 — 45 5 Total 61 7 4 1 0 0 19 2 0 0 84 10 — Bayern Munich 2006–07 Bundesliga 31 3 3 0 2 0 10 2 — 46 5 2007–08 19 1 4 1 1 0 3 1 — 27 3 2008–09 18 3 2 0 — 5 1 — 25 4 2009–10 31 6 5 2 — 12 1 — 48 9 2010–11 21 2 3 0 — 5 0 0 0 39 2 2011–12 13 4 2 0 — 7 0 — 22 4 2012–13 13 0 4 0 — 6 0 0 0 23 0 2013–14 12 1 3 0 — 2 0 1 0 18 1 Total 158 20 26 2 3 0 50 5 1 0 250 32 — Bayern Munich II 2010–11 3.
